safetyTips: Virtual appointments to comply with social distancing rules, and sealed products home delivered.
name: Sonia Christie
description: Having lost over 7 stone myself, and maintained for years, I am an Above and Beyond award winning consultant, supporting others to get themselves healthier and slimmer. With now virtual 1-to-1 appointments due to the current pandemic, and a personalised plan, with nutritionally balanced products that can be delivered direct to your door. With limited socialising, thereâ€™s never been a better time to lose weight!
